cast.name: 布瑞恩·德拉蒙德 Brian Drummond
吉吉·索尔·格雷罗 Gigi Saul Guerrero
塔比莎·杰曼 Tabitha St. Germain

introduction: A young pup, Rocket, and his best friend, Little Yellow Bird, travel to Letter Land, Sound Slide and Reading Woods to learn about the wonder of words.Developed and written by Emmy-winning kids TV screenwriter Rachel Lipman (Rugrats, Dinosaur Train, Hey Arnold!), Rocket Saves the Day was adapted for television by Peabody-winning producer Lynn Kestin Sessler. Along with Joel Bradley and Trevor Bentley for Atomic, Tad Hills, Lynn Kestin Sessler and Rachel Bader serve as Executive Producers.Rocket Saves the Day is a fun-filled adventure for preschoolers based on the New York Times bestselling book series created by Tad Hills. It will premiere 6 a.m. Tuesday, Dec. 26 on PBS Wisconsin PBS KIDS.Production company: Thunderbird Entertainment
